name: Monkey Magic
overview:
Monkey Magic is a 1979 arcade game by Nintendo.

it is an arcade game similar to Breakout. The goal is to use your paddle and a bouncing ball to destroy a giant monkey face at the top of the screen. Hitting it in different places awards different scores. Sometimes a block will drop, and if you catch it, you get extra points. Like in other games of the same nature, If the ball falls past the paddle, you lose a life.
